synopsis.text: The anime special, "Arslan Senki (TV): Dakkan no Yaiba," offers a thrilling recap of Arslan's perilous journey, from his daring escape alongside Daryun to their stand at the Peshawar Citadel, condensing the action-packed events of the initial 13 episodes of "The Heroic Legend of Arslan (2015)." This retrospective sheds light on Arslan's trials and tribulations, from narrowly escaping death at Kharlan's hands to ultimately reaching Peshawar, highlighting his growth and the challenges that still lie ahead in his quest to reclaim his kingdom.
